cta.subtitle: Play fun and entertaining games with Would You, featuring user polls and customization. Play Would You Rather, Truth or Dare, Never Have I Ever, Higher or Lower, and What Would You Do!

embed.description: Do you think that Mcdonalds has higher or lower searches than Wrestling?

reply.1: McDonalds probably has a lot more

neverHaveEver.title: Upgrade your server
neverHaveEver.subtitle: Upgrade your server with Would You, featuring a wide variety of games and customized questions.

vote.description: You've voted that you {haveDone, select, 0 {have} 1 {have not} other {unknown}} done it.

rather.1: Would you rather always be 10 minutes late or 20 minutes early?
rather.2: Would you rather be able to speak all languages or be able to play every musical instrument?
rather.3: Would you rather have a rewind button or a pause button in your life?
rather.4: Would you rather have super strength or super speed?
rather.5: Would you rather live in a haunted house or a house with no electricity?
rather.6: Would you rather have no one show up to your wedding or to your funeral?
rather.7: Would you rather not be able to taste or not be able to smell?
rather.8: Would you rather always have to say everything on your mind or never speak again?
rather.9: Would you rather be famous when you are alive and forgotten when you die, or unknown when you are alive but famous after you die?
rather.10: Would you rather be a millionaire but have no friends, or have close friends but be broke?

never.1: Never have I ever watched the Ghostbusters remake.
never.2: Never have I ever 'cleaned up' by piling everything into a closet.
never.3: Never have I ever sung karaoke.
never.4: Never have I ever watched an episode of Gilmore Girls.
never.5: Never have I ever pretended to know a stranger.
never.6: Never have I ever worn sleepwear and pretended it was clothing.
never.7: Never have I ever said 'excuse me' when there was no one around.
never.8: Never have I ever sang in the shower.
never.9: Never have I ever blamed farts on an animal.
never.10: Never have I ever slept in regular clothing.
